title: Tallgrass Prairie National Preserve: Photo Gallery
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Photo Gallery              Photo Gallery                    NPS Centennial   12 Photos  These photos are available for use for any Centennial and/or Media events          Christmas at the Lower Fox Creek School   4 Photos  Images from inside the one-room school as decorated for Christmas          Smokey Bear Birthday Event   7 Photos  Beloved icon Smokey Bear turned 70 years old in 2014. Three of the five National Park units in Kansas celebrated his birthday over the Labor Day Weekend. Here are photos from Tallgrass Prairie National Preserve
